login.title: Welcome to Vitaloop
login.slogan: Change your life for the better
login.sloganNewAccount: Let Vita be a part of your recovery
login.emailOrPhoneNumberIsRequired: Email or phone number is required
login.passwordShouldBeAtLeast: Password should be at least 6 characters

signOutPopup.areYouSureToSignOut: Are you sure you want to sign out?

home.quote: The only way to break a bad habit was to replace it with a better habit.

goal.goalsWillAppearHere: Your assigned goals will appear here.

addiction.chooseTheAddictionYouWantToRecover: Choose the thing that you want to recover from

profile.name: Name

createAccount.name: Name
createAccount.termsOfUseAndPrivacyPolicy: By signing up, you agree to our <strong1>Terms of Use</strong1> and <strong2>Privacy Policy</strong2>.

emotionsModal.sad: You seem to feel sad. Do you want to talk about it? We are always here for you.
emotionsModal.angry: You seem to feel angry. Do you want to talk about what's bothering you? We are always here for you.
emotionsModal.anxious: You seem to feel anxious. Do you want to talk about what's worrying you? We are always here for you.
emotionsModal.stressed: You seem to feel stressed. Do you want to talk about what's overwhelming you? We are always here for you.

resetTimer.youAreResettingTimer: You are resetting the timer for this recovery. This action will not delete your achievements but your progress will be reset.

aboutToRelapse.hereForYou: Hey, I‚Äôm here for you. If you‚Äôre feeling overwhelmed, we can talk. You don‚Äôt have to go through this alone.

deleteAccount.areYouSureToDelete: When you delete your account, you will lose all your progress. This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.noDontDelete: No, I don't want to delete

editAddiction.areYouSure: Are you sure to delete your recovery of {{addictionName}}?

deleteGoal.title: Delete goal?
deleteGoal.areYouSure: You are deleting your goal {{goal}}. Are you sure?

resetPassword.passwordMustBeDifferent: New password must be different from current password

newGoal.title: Let's go!
newGoal.description: You've set your new goal. You're going to achieve it! Let's get started.

ticket.title: Title
ticket.howCanIOrganizeRoutine: How can I organize my routine?
ticket.routinesCanBeOrganized: Routines can be organized from routine plan menu.
ticket.howCanIUpgradeMyAccount: How can I upgrade my account to Vita+?
ticket.youCanUpgradeFrom: Vita+ will be with you soon.
ticket.youCanRestoreYourPurchases: You can restore your purchases from account settings.

onboarding.welcomeDescription: Let's take a quick tour to help you get the most out of your recovery journey. We'll show you the main features that will support you along the way.
onboarding.emotionsDescription: Start each day by checking in with yourself. Tap on how you're feeling to help us provide personalized support and track your emotional journey.
onboarding.goalDescription: Create meaningful goals that align with your recovery. Track your progress, celebrate milestones, and stay motivated with clear targets to work toward.
onboarding.routineDescription: Establish daily habits and routines that support your recovery. Schedule tasks, set reminders, and create structure in your day-to-day life.
onboarding.recoveryDescription: Track your progress in overcoming addictions. See how far you've come, celebrate achievements, and get support when you need it most.
onboarding.readyDescription: You now know the key features that will help you on your recovery journey. Remember, we're here to support you every step of the way.
onboarding.vitaDescription: Vita will be your companion on this journey. You can share your feelings with it, and whenever needed, you can always count on its support.

paywall.trialTitle: {{days}} days left in your free trial
paywall.trialSubtitle: Continue your recovery journey with Vita+ to unlock all premium features
paywall.trialExpiredSubtitle: Upgrade to Vita+ to continue using all features and support your recovery
paywall.aiSupportDescription: Get personalized guidance and support from Vita whenever you need it
paywall.advancedAnalyticsDescription: Deep insights into your progress with detailed charts and trends
paywall.unlimitedGoalsDescription: Set as many recovery goals as you need to stay motivated
paywall.premiumContentDescription: Access exclusive recovery resources, meditations, and expert tips
paywall.smartNotificationsDescription: Personalized reminders and motivational messages at the right time
paywall.cloudSyncDescription: Sync your data across all devices and never lose your progress
paywall.termsAndPrivacy: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Subscription automatically renews unless cancelled.

chat.dailyLimitMessage: You've reached your daily message limit. Upgrade to Vita+ for unlimited messages.

deleteRoutineTask.title: Deleting task?
deleteRoutineTask.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{taskName}}" task?
